io.onedecision.engine.decisions.api

Interface ModelingService


  • public interface ModelingService
    Support for creating new decision models.

    This service constructs io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui beans and supports conversion to DMN models.

    Author:
    Tim Stephenson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Definitions convert(io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel source)
      Convert from the design time model to a DMN model.
      io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel createModelForTenant(io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel model, String tenantId)
      Model updates are typically additive but for the time being at least this is not enforced.
      void deleteModelForTenant(Long id, String tenantId)
      Delete the named model for the tenant.
      io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel getModelForTenant(Long id, String tenantId)

      Return just the decision models for a specific tenant.
      io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel updateModelForTenant(Long id, io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel model, String tenantId)

    • Method Detail

      • listForTenant

        List<io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel> listForTenant(String tenantId)
        Return just the decision models for a specific tenant.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - The tenant whose models should be returned.
        Returns:
        decision models for tenantId.

      • getModelForTenant

        io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel getModelForTenant(Long id,
                                                                         String tenantId)

      • createModelForTenant

        io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel createModelForTenant(io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel model,
                                                                            String tenantId)
        Model updates are typically additive but for the time being at least this is not enforced.
        Parameters:
        model - The new model.
        tenantId - The tenant to create the model for.
        Returns:
        design time decision model.

      • updateModelForTenant

        io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel updateModelForTenant(Long id,
                                                                            io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel model,
                                                                            String tenantId)
        Model updates are typically additive but for the time being at least this is not enforced.
        Parameters:
        id - Name of the decision to be updated.
        model - The updated model.
        tenantId - The tenant whose model is to be updated.
        Returns:
        design time decision model.

      • deleteModelForTenant

        void deleteModelForTenant(Long id,
                          String tenantId)
        Delete the named model for the tenant.
        Parameters:
        id - Name of a particular decision.
        tenantId - The tenant whose model is to be removed.

      • convert

        Definitions convert(io.onedecision.engine.decisions.model.ui.DecisionModel source)
        Convert from the design time model to a DMN model.
        Parameters:
        source - design time decision model.
        Returns:
        DMN decision model (definitions root element).
